data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xJCyyyPvtMIQ7kNvgHN43Ff&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC64hV2fkfbbZmmGztM63R_PF8gFd7MI-ttAxWeqo20hQ&oe=66D59FB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=inGyRPnKcmcQ7kNvgHPiYX-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBkp5UglzNkoFuuCOy64eecIVs7jpTBSJexHsdfhC9Oww&oe=66D5AD52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=CvSHV_hamiEQ7kNvgHtzr1j&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYANqGKXBMf98tu1-Pl5RnEnujAJ7wnqOj77FovgOvfe4w&oe=66D59889)
